mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.merchant_code AS "merchantCode", a.gift_category AS "giftCategory", a.gift_count AS "giftCount", a.gift_price AS "giftPrice", a.gift_amount_total AS "giftAmountTotal", a.payment_no AS "paymentNo", a.pay_time AS "payTime", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.status AS "status", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.gift_merchant_code AS "giftMerchantCode", c.category_name AS "giftConfigCategoryName", m.nickname AS "merchantName", m.referee AS "merchantId", u.login_name AS "merchantAccount", a.pay_channel AS "payChannel"
left join member_info m on m.id = a.merchant_code left join sys_user u on u.id = a.merchant_code left join gift_config_category c on c.id = a.gift_category
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gift_purchase_log a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gift_purchase_log( id, merchant_code, gift_category, gift_count, gift_price, gift_amount_total, payment_no, pay_time, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, status, remarks, gift_merchant_code, pay_channel ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{merchantCode}, #{giftCategory}, #{giftCount}, #{giftPrice}, #{giftAmountTotal}, #{paymentNo}, #{payTime}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{status}, #{remarks}, #{giftMerchantCode}, #{payChannel} )
mapper.update: UPDATE gift_purchase_log SET merchant_code = #{merchantCode}, gift_category = #{giftCategory}, gift_count = #{giftCount}, gift_price = #{giftPrice}, gift_amount_total = #{giftAmountTotal}, payment_no = #{paymentNo}, pay_time = #{payTime}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, status = #{status}, remarks = #{remarks}, gift_merchant_code = #{giftMerchantCode}, pay_channel = #{payChannel} WHERE id = #{id}
